myDetails.tradingLimitHelpText: All transactions count towards your limit. Applied per account.
myDetails.rejected: You may only remove any pooled assets.

myAddresses.instructions: You are linking a new ethereum address to your Passport.
myAddresses.addressLinked: This address is already linked to you!
myAddresses.addressRegistered: This address has been previously registered. Please select another address.
myAddresses.addError: Some error occurred and we could not add your address
myAddresses.addNameError: Some error occurred and we could not updated your address name
myAddresses.unlinkConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to unlink this address: <1>({{address}})</1>?
myAddresses.unlinkConfirmationDescription: You are unlinking your ethereum address from your Passport. The address will be unable to transact unless  you link it again in the future. Remove all assets from the platform before proceeding.
myAddresses.unlinkAddressError: An error occurred when trying to unlink address ({{address}})

modal.instruction: You are linking a new ethereum address to your Passport.
modal.instruction1: In your wallet, select or change to the address you want to add. You will then confirm and sign a message with your new address.
modal.selectNewAddress: Select your new address in your wallet
modal.giveAddressName: Give you new address a name (optional)
modal.confirmInstruction: Confirm your new address in your wallet.
modal.confirmation: I confirm i have removed all assets from the platform and wish to unlink this address from my account.
